metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title contains 'Sr.' and requires 8-10 years experience, which matches senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data engineering with Palantir Foundry and Hadoop technologies

sub_specialty.evidence: Palantir Foundry and Hadoop-based technologies suggest general data engineering focus rather than specific streaming, ML, or governance specialization

leadership_expectation.evidence: Senior level position suggests technical leadership expectations, but no mention of direct reports or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned - Hadoop-based technologies and Palantir Foundry can run on multiple platforms

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) are typically used for batch processing rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned - Hadoop ecosystem might use Oozie but not explicitly stated

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem with Hive suggests data lake patterns using HDFS rather than modern data warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Looking for locals only for onsite' requiring candidates to be local to Atlanta, GA area

timezone_focus.evidence: Located in Atlanta, GA (US) with local requirement, suggesting US work authorization focus

relocation_required.evidence: Looking for locals only implies candidates should already be in the Atlanta area, no relocation assistance mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and 'locals only' requirement suggests preference for established US work authorization

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Looking for locals only and no mention of student visa support suggests established work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: Locals only requirement implies US work authorization needed but no specific citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent employment type strongly suggests W2 employee status rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, learning budget, conference budget, or PTO policy mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career growth, advancement opportunities, or development programs in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of career tracks, IC paths, management paths, or specialist tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills (Data Engineering, Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark) are must-haves with no nice-to-have skills mentioned

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description for Senior Data Engineer role with specific technical requirements, not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8-10 years experience requirement is appropriate for senior level, and skills mentioned are reasonable for data engineering role
